subject: RE: [junit] Junit Design Patterns.
msgSnippet: ... Ya, no argument there. Something that ll generate diagrams from code (I use Together.. I worked for them for a while) is great for getting clean diagrams
messageBody:
On Fri, 2002-10-11 at 14:10, Chappell, Simon P wrote:

> My problem is that no modeling tool yet competes with my whiteboard and coloured markers.

Ya, no argument there.

Something that'll generate diagrams from code (I use Together.. I worked
for them for a while) is great for getting clean diagrams for a book or
article. Even just sketching diagrams for something like that is easier
in a tool like TCC or Argo, etc. that using something like Visio.

Dave
--
Dave Astels (dave@...)
Coauthor of "A Practical Guide to XP"
Editor of the Test-Driven Development Edition of The Coad Letter
